yagalib.util
Interface StatWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileStatWriter, NullWriter
public interface StatWriter

A class for storing the fitness data for a given generation of Organisms. The EvolutionManager will call this interface's logGeneration() method after every generation. The implementing class is free to serialize and store this data however it sees fit. If no data storage is needed, a NullWriter is provided.

Method Summary
 void init()
          Initialize the writer.
 void logGeneration(Integer generation, Integer maxFitness, Integer minFitness, Integer medianFitness)
          Log one generation's fitness data to whatever store the StatWriter employs.
 

Method Detail

init

void init()
Initialize the writer.

logGeneration

void logGeneration(Integer generation,
                   Integer maxFitness,
                   Integer minFitness,
                   Integer medianFitness)
Log one generation's fitness data to whatever store the StatWriter employs.

Parameters:
generation - the generation number
maxFitness - the fitness of the most fit member of the generation
minFitness - the fitness of the least fir member of the generation
medianFitness - the fitness of the median member of the generation
